name: Manowar
description:
Manowar: what doesn't kill you will make you ponder.

"There are some levels that will basically snap your brain in half" - TouchArcade

"A stunning visual treat" - AppAdvice

"I’ve yet to come across a puzzle-game like Manowar" - appgefahren.de

"Manowar is really outstanding" - GottaSolveIt

"Incredibly satisfying" - Softonic

"Will keep you coming back for hours" - AppsMeNow

---

Journey over 60 individually crafted levels that each pose a unique challenge to be unraveled

- pay once for the whole experience: no IAP or ads

- universal app for iPad and iPhone

- unlock the speed run mode, compete on the global leaderboards, challenge friends with game center achievements

---

manowargame.com
twitter.com/manowargame
facebook.com/manowargame

---

- tilt the ship and tap to fire cannons, empty the ship to solve the puzzle

- designed to simultaneously challenge your logic, lateral thinking and timing skills

---

NOTE: A bonus stage is unlocked when you beat the game. You have to go hunting for it. Don't give up!
